qas.question: When did a boat arrive at the island with damage during a race?

what was broken/damaged on the boat?
Where did the Volvo break its mast?

plausible_answers.text: sailing boat Puma's Mar Mostro participant in Volvo Ocean Race arrived to the island after her mast broke

qas.question: What made the island unknown worldwide?
What made Cape Town known worldwide?
